item.title: About
item.description: Hi there ðŸ‘‹This is Xi Wang, study at the University of Massachusetts Amherst(UMASS) in Computer Engineering major. He is interested in Full-stack Development, Cloud Computing, and Deep Learning. He has finished some awesome projects. For instance, he led a team to develop an intelligent rot to collect badminton shuttlecock, develop an AI-based video reframing system for lecture videos; and proposed a light-weight CNN model to recognize Tick on the mobile device, etc.
